date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

docket_number.label: Docket number
docket_number.help_text: The docket number in the lower court.

assigned_to_str.label: Assigned to str
assigned_to_str.help_text: The judge that the case was assigned to, as a string.

ordering_judge_str.label: Ordering judge str
ordering_judge_str.help_text: The judge that issued the final order in the case, as a string.

court_reporter.label: Court reporter
court_reporter.help_text: The court reporter responsible for the case.

date_disposed.label: Date disposed
date_disposed.help_text: The date the case was disposed at the lower court.

date_filed.label: Date filed
date_filed.help_text: The date the case was filed in the lower court.

date_judgment.label: Date judgment
date_judgment.help_text: The date of the order or judgment in the lower court.

date_judgment_eod.label: Date judgment eod
date_judgment_eod.help_text: The date the judgment was Entered On the Docket at the lower court.

date_filed_noa.label: Date filed noa
date_filed_noa.help_text: The date the notice of appeal was filed for the case.

date_received_coa.label: Date received coa
date_received_coa.help_text: The date the case was received at the court of appeals.

assigned_to.label: Assigned to
assigned_to.help_text: The judge the case was assigned to.

ordering_judge.label: Ordering judge
ordering_judge.help_text: The judge that issued the final order in the case.
